missing_blank_before_heading.description: MD022: Headings should be surrounded by blank lines

emphasis_as_heading.description: MD036: Emphasis should not be used instead of a heading

files.content: **This email system implementation represents a significant architectural improvement that positions PenguinMails for enterprise-scale operations with superior performance, security, and business intelligence capabilities.**
**This architectural evolution establishes PenguinMails as an enterprise-grade email infrastructure platform with proven scalability and performance excellence.**
**The goal is understanding OLTP operational challenges through building. You'll grasp multi-tenant database design far better by implementing it than by discussing it theoretically.**
**For detailed implementation guidance, refer to the specialized documents:**
**Secure user authentication and comprehensive profile management powered by NileDB.**
**Automated opt-out handling to maintain compliance and sender reputation.**
**Privacy-first architecture and data handling practices to protect user data.**
**Ensure compliance with US email marketing laws through automated CAN-SPAM features.**
**Connect external Email Service Providers (ESPs) for enhanced deliverability and specialized sending.**
**Send different email types through different providers:**
**Choose the right ESP for each use case:**
**Enterprise-grade multi-tenancy with complete data isolation and workspace management.**
**Automated management of Hostwind VPS instances for scalable email delivery.**
**Flexible subscription plans with seamless upgrades, downgrades, and usage-based billing.**
**Secure, PCI-compliant payment processing powered by Stripe.**
**Centralized billing management with usage tracking, invoices, and payment history.**
**Ready for Phase 3 implementation in next session!**
**For 100K email campaigns with optimized content (40% open rate, 8.5% reply rate, 3% meeting rate):**
**For 100K email campaigns with optimized content (40% open rate, 8.5% reply rate, 3% meeting rate):**

missing_blank_before_list.description: MD032: Lists should be surrounded by blank lines
